name: Coverage-Triggered WCDMA IRAT Handover
summary: The feature enables initiating handovers to WDCMA cells, instead of initiating RwR. The

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT
parameters.description: Indicates the RAT of the target cell  Has the value EVENT_VALUE_WCDMA when a WCDMA Handover preparation i                   performed.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT
parameters.description: Type of selection for the handover target cell: blind (based on preconfigured                   information) or measurement based.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_IN
parameters.description: Indicates the RAT of the source cell.  Has the value EVENT_VALUE_UTRA_SOURCE when an incoming WCDMA handover preparation                   is performed.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT
parameters.description: Indicates the RAT of the target cell.  Has the value EVENT_VALUE_WCDMA when a WCDMA handover execution is performed.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT
parameters.description: Type of selection for the handover target cell: blind (based on preconfigured                   information) or measurement based.

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT
events.description: Indicates the RAT of the target cell  Has the value EVENT_VALUE_WCDMA when a WCDMA Handover preparation i                   performed.

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT
events.description: Type of selection for the handover target cell: blind (based on preconfigured                   information) or measurement based.

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_IN
events.description: Indicates the RAT of the source cell.  Has the value EVENT_VALUE_UTRA_SOURCE when an incoming WCDMA handover preparation                   is performed.

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT
events.description: Indicates the RAT of the target cell.  Has the value EVENT_VALUE_WCDMA when a WCDMA handover execution is performed.

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT
events.description: Type of selection for the handover target cell: blind (based on preconfigured                   information) or measurement based.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011011 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011011 MO instance.
